## formatEnvVars() function

Formats an [Environment](./cloud.environment.md) for printing in human-readable format.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function formatEnvVars(env: Environment): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  env | [<code>Environment</code>](./cloud.environment.md) | The environment to be printed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

- A string representation of the environment for use in logging or debugging.
